console.log("Bidder jobs (freelancer1):", bidderJobs);
const bidderJobs = await contract.connect(ethers.provider.getSigner(2)).getJobsForBidder();
console.log("Assigned jobs (freelancer1):", assignedJobs);
const assignedJobs = await contract.connect(ethers.provider.getSigner(2)).getAssignedJobs();
console.log("My jobs (client1):", myJobs);
const myJobs = await contract.connect(ethers.provider.getSigner(1)).getMyJobs();
console.log("All jobs:", jobs);
const jobs = await contract.getJobs();
const contract = await ethers.getContractAt("DappWorks", "0xf5059a5d33d5853360d16c683c16e67980206f36");
console.log("Bidder jobs (freelancer1):", bidderJobs);
const bidderJobs = await contract.connect(ethers.provider.getSigner(2)).getJobsForBidder(); // freelancer1
console.log("Assigned jobs (freelancer1):", assignedJobs);
const assignedJobs = await contract.connect(ethers.provider.getSigner(2)).getAssignedJobs(); // freelancer1
console.log("My jobs (client1):", myJobs);
const myJobs = await contract.connect(ethers.provider.getSigner(1)).getMyJobs(); // client1
console.log("All jobs:", jobs);
const jobs = await contract.getJobs();
const contract = await ethers.getContractAt("DappWorks", "0xf5059a5d33d5853360d16c683c16e67980206f36");
await contract.getJobs();
const contract = await ethers.getContractAt("DappWorks", "0x959922bE3CAee4b8Cd9a407cc3ac1C251C2007B1");
await contract.getJobs();
const contract = await ethers.getContractAt("DappWorks", "0xYourDeployedContractAddress");
